sentences.sContent: That we all have Thanksgiving dinner together?
sentences.sCn: 我们会一起用感恩节晚餐吗？

sentences.sContent: As she puts it, “We do see each other for Thanksgiving and some meals.
sentences.sCn: 如她所解释的那样，“我们在感恩节和一些餐会上见面”。

sentences.sContent: Such treaties begin with, but soon go far beyond, the jolly exchange of pie at Thanksgiving for cake on birthdays.
sentences.sCn: 这样的协议一开始，就广泛的流传开来，为了生日时的蛋糕在感恩节交换派的快乐。

remMethod.val: thanks(感谢) ＋ giving(给予) → 感谢上帝的给予 → 感恩节

trans.tranOther: a public holiday in the US and in Canada when families have a large meal together to celebrate and be thankful for food, health, families etc
